name: Teaching and Visulization Lab
description:
Faculty and graduates students can request to use the Teaching and Visualization Lab, a black-box room that offers 270-degree immersive projection on three walls / five screens for a total of 94 linear feet of high-definition display surface. The room can host a variety of events including:

- High-impact presentations of large-scale visualizations and simulations
- Technology-rich interactive sessions in a small group setting
- Command/control room simulation
- Immersive computing
- Game research
- “Big data” decision theater
- Comparative social computing

270° stereoscopic 3D projection is available.

address.streetAddress: 1070 Partners Way Campus Box 7132 Raleigh, NC 27606
